<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--006a51241073e994b41acfe9ec718e94-->
### Code Coverage & Benchmarks
For details see: https://corecheck.dev/bitcoin/bitcoin/pulls/33625.
<!--021abf342d371248e50ceaed478a90ca-->
### Reviews
See [the guideline](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#code-review) for information on the review process.
| Type | Reviewers |
| ---- | --------- |
| ACK | [hebasto](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/33625#pullrequestreview-3341520000) |

If your review is incorrectly listed, please react with ðŸ‘Ž to this comment and the bot will ignore it on the next update.
<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#32966](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/32966) (Silent Payments: Receiving by Eunovo)
* [#28201](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28201) (Silent Payments: sending by josibake)
* [#28122](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28122) (Silent Payments: Implement BIP352 by josibake)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.
<!--5faf32d7da4f0f540f40219e4f7537a3-->
### LLM Linter (âœ¨ experimental)

Possible typos and grammar issues:

- a ECDSA -> an ECDSA [use "an" before a vowel sound]
- that add -> that adds [singular "variant" requires singular verb]
- make a double deposits or double withdrawals -> cause double deposits or double withdrawals [grammar: "make a double deposits" is ungrammatical; "cause double deposits or double withdrawals" conveys the intended meaning]
